caption:
🎉🏈 Score Big with Primitiv! 🏈🎉 

Want to win the ultimate VIP fan bundle? We’re giving away 11 of them!: 
⭐ A custom Primitiv jersey autographed by @megatron 
⭐ A signed football 
⭐ A limited-edition Calvin Johnson bobblehead 

**How to Enter:** 
1️⃣ Fill out the “Score Big with Primitiv” entry form—no purchase necessary! 
2️⃣ Purchase any eligible Primitiv product (Primitiv, Turf, Primitiv Performance) and submit your receipt for an extra entry. 
3️⃣ Share a pic of your Primitiv product or yourself in Primitiv gear, tag @Primitiv_Group, and use #ScoreBigWithPrimitiv for bonus entries! 
4️⃣ A winner will be selected from each store listed below as well as one extra from online sign ups!

Campaign Dates: 
📅 Entry Window: Now – March 31, 2025 
📢 Winner Contacted: April 2, 2025 

🌟 Must be 21+ to enter. No purchase necessary. Open to participants at locations carrying Primitiv products. Visit participating locations for more info! 

💡 Click the link or scan the QR code to get started! 

@primitivgroup_niles @thebloomery.mi @skymintofficial @greenhousewalledlake @mf.wayne @dreamscannaig @the.woods.mi @houseofdankmi @puff.lifestylesbackup @themintsocials @thewoodsmtpleasant @houseofdankculture 

#PrimitivGroup #ScoreBigWithPrimitiv #Giveaway #CalvinJohnson #81 #NFL #Turf
